issue.title: [Java] Implement equals/approxEquals API for VectorSchemaRoot
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6662](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6662). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently with the new added visitor APIs(ARROW-6211), we could implement equals/approxEquals for VectorSchemaRoot.

comments.body:
